about.title: Technical Consulting Services
about.description: Specialized guidance to help your team overcome technical challenges, optimize your architecture, and deliver high-quality software.

expertise.title: My specialties
expertise.description: With over 10 years of software development experience, I have a proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions.

areas.title: Software Architecture
areas.description: Design scalable and sustainable system architectures aligned with your business objectives and technical requirements.

areas.title: Code Review
areas.description: Comprehensive code reviews to identify bugs, security issues, and opportunities for optimization and improvement.

areas.title: Database Optimization
areas.description: Improve database performance, optimize queries, and design efficient data models for your applications.

areas.title: Technical Strategy
areas.description: Develop technical scripts and strategies that align with your business objectives and maximize your team's effectiveness.

areas.title: Technology Selection
areas.description: Guidance on selecting the right technologies, frameworks, and tools for your specific project requirements.

areas.title: Team Optimization
areas.description: Improve team workflows, development processes, and collaboration to increase productivity and code quality.

engagementModels.title: Engagement Models
engagementModels.description: Flexible consulting options to meet your needs.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here are some common questions I receive about my consulting services.

items.question: What is your consulting process?
items.answer: My consulting process involves detailed project analysis, followed by personalized recommendations and continuous support.

items.question: Which technologies do you use?
items.answer: I use a variety of modern technologies, including JavaScript, Python, Node.js, React, Angular, and many more.

items.question: How can I schedule a consultation?
items.answer: You can schedule a consultation by contacting me through the contact form or sending an email directly.

contact.title: Ready to solve your technical challenges?
contact.description: Schedule a free 1-hour session to discuss your project and how I can help your team succeed.

successStories.title: Success Stories
successStories.description: See how my mentoring helped other developers achieve their goals.

items.name: Felipe Carneiro
items.feedback: The mentoring helped me with the theoretical and practical basis of software development. Before, I studied independently, but with Lojhan's teaching, my learning and direction increased exponentially.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here are some common questions I receive about my mentoring services.

items.question: What is your mentoring process?
items.answer: My mentoring process involves individual sessions where we discuss your goals, challenges, and how I can help you achieve them.

items.question: Which technologies do you use?
items.answer: I use a variety of modern technologies, including JavaScript, Python, Node.js, React, Angular, and much more.

items.question: How can I schedule a mentoring session?
items.answer: You can schedule a mentoring session by contacting me through the contact form or sending an email directly.

contact.title: Ready to take the next step in your career?
contact.description: Schedule a free 30-minute session to discuss your goals and how I can help you achieve them.
